Head Quarters 20th Ky Inf
Louisville Ky Oct 15th 1863
To His Excellency
Thos.E. Bramlette
Sir

We the undersigned Officers of the 20th Ky Vol Inf do respectfully yet earnestly recommend Andrew McCampbell of Jessamine County late Capt in this Regt as worthy & well qualified for the position of Col of Militia. Capt McCampbell Served with honor & distinction in the Regt. until last Spring when he was compelled by physical disability to resign and retire to private life He is now fully able to discharge the duties of Col of the militia & we earnestly request you to give him Said appointment. being Satisfied that he would discharge all the duties of Said position with honor, to himself and credit to the Service
With renewed assurances of our high esteem for you personally we have the honor to be Sincerely yours & OC

T B Waller, Maj Comd 20th Ky Inf
C McLeod, Capt. Co. "J" 20 Ky
John Glenn Capt Co "H"
